Params: {3: 'After securing the route, you finally have time to take a look at the enormous architectural complex in front of you: the old Wuming.'}

{3: 'Unmanned factories, automated distribution warehouses, towering apartment buildingsâ€”this impressive sight makes one wonder how many people could be accommodated here if all those facilities were operational.'}
{3: 'But they have been reduced to rubble by a series of foolish mistakes committed by humans in the Post-Pandemic Age.'}
{3: "At the center of the ruins is a scatter of undamaged factory buildings. That's most likely where you need to go."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I did a scanning of the area and uploaded the terrain data to your terminal for your reference. I believe it will confirm my conclusion.', 4: '3'}
{2: "So it's impossible to go around it?", 3: '10'}
{2: "Then let's do it the hard way.", 3: '12'}
